entry.title: Re @KonstantinKisin I do not think it is simple at all, but I have yet to hear any realistic path to peace. Ukraine has achieved many brilliant tactic...
entry.summary: Re @KonstantinKisin I do not think it is simple at all, but I have yet to hear any realistic path to peace. Ukraine has achieved many brilliant tactical victories, but should be wary of overconfidence leading to strategic defeat. When Russia fully mobilizes, millions on both sides will die.
